hotels.title: Five-Star Saudi Arabia Palatial Luxury
hotels.description: Experience palatial luxury at InterContinental Madinah-Dar Al Iman, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned within the courtyard of the Prophet's Mosque Al-Masjid an-Nabawi. This five-star property defines grandeur with its contemporary and luxurious design. When not resting in your grandiose guest room or sampling fine food, find yourself within arm's reach of the city's Islamic sites for ziyarat, including Masjid Quba, Masjid Al-Qiblatain and The Seven Mosques, as well as major shopping precincts.

hotels.title: Five-Star Pullman Madinah Escape Just Steps from Prophet's Mosque with Panoramic Haram Views
hotels.description: Disconnect to reconnect in the sacred city of Madinah with a stay in an elegant Pullman sanctuary. This five-star retreat offers an unrivalled location, just steps from the Prophet's Mosque-Masjid an-Nabawi. Feel the peace in exquisite rooms offering panoramic views of the city or the holy Haram. Indulge in Middle Eastern and global cuisine at one of the hotel's three onsite restaurants, or enjoy a refreshing drink at Atrium, the elegant tea lounge. A shuttle service to the mosque makes your entry to the place of worship easy and Pullman will attend to every small detail to make your stay seamless. For a change of scenery, explore the vibrant local markets or the historic Quba Mosque, all within easy reach of your luxurious abode. The historic Ubud mountain is also within a 15-minute distance for those interested in exploring more of this historically rich city.
